debates.showAs: Electricity (Supply) (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reduce restrictions on the power of the Electricity Supply Board to carry out works concerning the levels on the Shannon Lakes (Lough Derg, Lough Ree and Lough Allen), to amend the Electricity (Supply) (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1934 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do laghdú srianta ar chumhacht Bhord Soláthair an Leictreachais oibreacha a dhéanamh maidir leis na leibhéil ar Lochanna na Sionainne (Loch Deirgeirt, Loch Rí agus Loch Aillionn), do leasú an Achta Leictreachais (Soláthar) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 1934 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Leictreachais (Soláthar) (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2025

debates.showAs: Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks (Amendment) Bill 2025: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks Act 2022; to amend the eligibility criteria for applications for grants in respect of alternative accommodation, storage and immediate repairs; to provide for an application for an increase in the amount of a grant for remediation of certain dwellings damaged by the use of defective concrete blocks; to amend the time limit for the payment of a grant for remediation; to provide for the review of certain approved remediation options and a procedure for the approval of a new remediation option and grant; to enable certain joint owners to become relevant owners; to provide for charging orders for additional payments and their release; to provide for information sharing between specified public bodies; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Leasúchán ar Theaghaisí a nDearnadh Damáiste Dóibh mar gheall ar Úsáid Bloc Coincréite Lochtach, 2022; do leasú na gcritéar incháilitheachta le haghaidh iarratais ar dheontais i leith cóiríocht ionadúil, stóráil agus deisiúcháin láithreacha; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiarratas ar mhéadú ar mhéid an deontais le haghaidh leasúchán ar theaghaisí áirithe a ndearnadh damáiste dóibh mar gheall ar úsáid bloc coincréite lochtach; do leasú na teorann ama chun deontas le haghaidh leasúcháin a íoc; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le roghanna ceadaithe áirithe i ndáil le leasúchán a athbhreithniú agus maidir le nós imeachta chun rogha nua leasúcháin agus deontas nua leasúcháin a cheadú; dá chumasú do chomhúinéirí áirithe teacht chun bheith ina n-úinéirí iomchuí; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le horduithe muirir le haghaidh íocaíochtaí breise agus maidir lena scaoileadh; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhroinnt faisnéise idir comhlachtaí poiblí sonraithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Remediation of Dwellings Damaged by the Use of Defective Concrete Blocks (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Leasúchán ar Theaghaisí a nDearnadh Damáiste Dóibh mar gheall ar Úsáid Bloc Coincréite Lochtach (Leasú), 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prevent and address the commission of the international crimes of genocide and apartheid by the State of Israel, by providing for the establishment of economic sanctions.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur cosc le Stát Iosrael, agus do thabhairt aghaidh ar Stát Iosrael, do dhéanamh na gcoireanna idirnáisiúnta arb éard iad cinedhíothú agus cinedheighilt, trí shocrú a dhéanamh chun smachtbhannaí eacnamaíocha a bhunú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sanctions against the State of Israel Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Smachtbhannaí i gcoinne Stát Iosrael, 2025

debates.showAs: Electricity Regulation (Climate Action and Connection to Distribution and Transmission Systems) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the Commission for the Regulation of Utilities to direct that offers for connection to the electricity transmission and distribution systems be made subject to terms and conditions requiring that specified measures be taken for the purpose of avoiding, preventing, reducing, offsetting or abating greenhouse gas emissions or otherwise in furtherance of the national climate objective; for that purpose to amend the Electricity Regulation Act 1999; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú don Choimisiún um Rialáil Fóntais a ordú go ndéanfar tairiscintí maidir le cur i gceangal leis na córais tarchurtha agus dáilte leictreachais a chur faoi réir téarmaí agus coinníollacha lena gceanglófar go ndéanfar bearta sonraithe d’fhonn astaíochtaí gás ceaptha teasa a sheachaint, a chosc, a laghdú, a fhritháireamh nó a mhaolú nó ar shlí eile ar mhaithe leis an gcuspóir náisiúnta aeráide; chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Rialáil Leictreachais, 1999; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Electricity Regulation (Climate Action and Connection to Distribution and Transmission Systems) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialáil Leictreachais (Gníomhú Aeráide agus Cur i gCeangal le Córais Dáilte agus Tarchurtha), 2025

bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun Aerfort Bhaile Átha Cliath a athainmniú mar Aerfort Idirnáisiúnta Sheáin Lemass, Baile Átha Cliath agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aerfort Idirnáisiúnta Sheáin Lemass, Baile Átha Cliath, 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the sale of certain devices that vaporise substances, other than tobacco, for the purpose of inhalation through a mouthpiece and that are not designed or intended to be re-used; to provide for enforcement measures in relation to the prohibition on the sale of such devices; to provide for certain related offences; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc feistí áirithe a dhíol, is feistí lena ndéantar substaintí, seachas tobac, a ghalú chun iad a ionanálú trí bhéalóg agus nach bhfuil deartha lena n-athúsáid ná nach bhfuil beartaithe iad a athúsáid; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le bearta forfheidhmiúcháin i ndáil leis an toirmeasc ar dhíol feistí den sórt sin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta gaolmhara áirithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for animal welfare considerations in the operation of dog breeding establishments, including but not limited to a cap on the number of breeding bitches, the age of bitches allowed to breed, the age of pups when removed from their mothers, a staff-to-bitch ratio, and to prohibit the use of surgical artificial insemination; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cúinsí a bhaineann le leas ainmhithe in oibriú bunachas pórúcháin madraí, lena n-áirítear uasteorainn leis an líon soitheanna pórúcháin, le haois soitheanna a gceadófar dóibh pórú, le haois coileán nuair a scarfar lena máithreacha iad, le cóimheas idir foireann agus soitheanna, ach gan bheith teoranta don mhéid sin, agus do thoirmeasc inseamhnú saorga máinliachta a úsáid; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Insurance Act 1994 to specify the amount of premium to be paid from the Risk Equalisation Fund in respect of certain classes of insured persons from 1 April 2026; to make certain other amendments to that Act, including to specify the amount of the hospital utilisation credit applicable from 1 April 2026 and to specify the percentage applicable for the purposes of the definitions relating to high cost claims; to amend Schedule 1 to that Act; to make a consequential amendment to the Stamp Duties Consolidation Act 1999; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Árachais Sláinte, 1994 d’fhonn méid na préimhe a íocfar as an gCiste um Chothromú Fiontar i leith aicmí áirithe daoine árachaithe ón 1 Aibreán 2026 a shonrú; do dhéanamh leasuithe áirithe eile ar an Acht sin, lena n-áirítear leasuithe a dhéanamh air d’fhonn méid an chreidmheasa úsáide ospidéil is infheidhme ón 1 Aibreán 2026 a shonrú agus d’fhonn an céatadán is infheidhme chun críocha na mínithe a bhaineann le héilimh ardchostais a shonrú; do dhéanamh leasú ar Sceideal 1 a ghabhann leis an Acht sin; do dhéanamh leasú iarmhartach ar an Acht Comhdhlúite Dleachtanna Stampa, 1999; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Árachais Sláinte (Leasú), 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an increase in the number of ordinary judges of the Court of Appeal and, for that purpose, to amend the Courts (Establishment and Constitution) Act 1961; to provide for an increase in the number of ordinary judges of the High Court, ordinary judges of the Circuit Court and judges of the District Court and, for those purposes, to amend the Courts (Supplemental Provisions) Act 1961 and the Courts and Court Officers Act 1995; to amend the Street and House to House Collections Act 1962, the Child Care Act 1991 and the Gambling Regulation Act 2024; to repeal certain provisions of the Family Courts Act 2024; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le méadú ar líon na ngnáthbhreithiúna den Chúirt Achomhairc agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú Acht na gCúirteanna (Bunú agus Comhdhéanamh), 1961; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le méadú ar líon na ngnáthbhreithiúna den Ard-Chúirt, ar líon na ngnáthbhreithiúna den Chúirt Chuarda agus ar líon na mbreithiúna den Chúirt Dúiche agus, chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú Acht na gCúirteanna (Forálacha Forlíontacha), 1961 agus Acht na gCúirteanna agus na nOifigeach Cúirte, 1995; do leasú an Achta um Bailiúcháin Sráide agus ó Theach go Teach, 1962, an Achta um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 agus an Achta um Rialáil Cearrbhachais, 2024; d’aisghairm forálacha áirithe d’Acht na gCúirteanna Teaghlaigh, 2024; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta Leictreachais (Soláthar) (Leasú), 1954 chun méadú a dhéanamh ar an méid comhiomlán airgid a fhéadfaidh Bord Soláthair an Leictreachais a fháil ar iasacht; do leasú an Achta Leictreachais (Soláthar) (Leasú), 2001 chun na socruithe a bhainfidh le heisiúintí beartaithe stoic chaipitiúil ag an mBord sin chuig an Aire Caiteachais Phoiblí, Bonneagair, Athchóiriúcháin Seirbhíse Poiblí agus Digitiúcháin agus chuig an Aire Aeráide, Fuinnimh agus Comhshaoil a shonrú agus, freisin, dá chumasú don Bhord céatadán gaolmhar dá stoc caipitiúil a chur ar fáil lena shuibscríobh d’fhostaithe de chuid an Bhoird nó d’iontaobhaithe thar a gceann, de réir scéim cheadaithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the regulation in the public interest of the private and commercial use of unmanned aircraft systems, commonly referred to as drones; to create an additional consideration for issuance of a National Planning Statement; to require local authorities to prepare objectives for the management of unmanned aircraft system operations; to permit any person, a local authority or the Environmental Protection Agency make a complaint to the District Court with respect to the emission of noise from certain privately or commercially operated unmanned aircraft system or systems causing annoyance; to amend the Planning and Development Act 2024; to amend the Environmental Protection Agency Act 1992 (as amended); and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialáil a dhéanamh, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, ar an úsáid phríobháideach agus tráchtala a bhaintear as córais aerárthaí gan foireann, dá ngairtear ladrainn go coitianta; do chumadh cúinse breise chun Ráiteas Náisiúnta Pleanála a eisiúint; dá cheangal ar údaráis áitiúla cuspóirí a ullmhú chun oibríochtaí córas aerárthaí gan foireann a bhainistiú; dá cheadú d’aon duine, d’údarás áitiúil nó don Ghníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil gearán a dhéanamh leis an gCúirt Dúiche maidir le torann, is cúis le crá, a bhíonn ag córas nó córais aerárthaí áirithe gan foireann a oibrítear go príobháideach nó ar bhonn tráchtála; do leasú an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2024; do leasú an Achta fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 (arna leasú); agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ladrainn a Rialáil, 2025

debates.showAs: Public Health (Alcohol) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Public Health (Alcohol) Act 2018 by restricting the advertising of alcohol-free and low-alcohol products bearing any statement of any trade description or designation, or a display or other publication of a trademark, emblem, marketing image or logo, of an alcohol product with the aim or direct or indirect effect of promoting an alcohol product.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte Poiblí (Alcól), 2018 trí shrian a chur le fógairt táirgí gan alcól agus ar bheagán alcóil ar a bhfuil aon ráiteas ar aon tuairisc nó sainainmniú trádála de chuid táirge alcóil, nó ar a bhfuil trádmharc, feathal, íomhá mhargaíochta nó lógó de chuid táirge alcóil ar taispeáint nó foilsithe ar shlí eile, is fógairt arb é an cuspóir nó an éifeacht dhíreach nó neamhdhíreach atá léi táirge alcóil a chur chun cinn.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte Poiblí (Alcól) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Trespass on Land) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Foghail ar Thalamh), 2025

debates.showAs: Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: Second Stage [Private Members]
Education (Affordable School Uniforms) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision whereby the Minister for Education shall make regulations governing the implementation of an affordable school uniform policy in schools; and for this purpose, to amend the Education Act 1998.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú trína ndéanfaidh an tAire Oideachais rialacháin lena rialófar cur i ngníomh beartais éidí scoile inacmhainne i scoileanna; agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1998.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Éidí Scoile Inacmhainne), 2025

debates.showAs: Environment (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2025: Second Stage
Environment (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2025: Referral to Select Committee

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the making of applications for licences, or applications for reviews of licences, under Part IV of the Environmental Protection Agency Act 1992 or under Part V of the Waste Management Act 1996 in certain emergency circumstances; to give effect to Articles 1(3) and 2(4) of Directive 2011/92/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 13 December 2011 on the assessment of the effects of certain public and private projects on the environment, as amended by Directive 2014/52/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 16 April 2014, in relation to applications for, or applications for reviews of, such licences; to make provision in relation to periods for decision-making relating to certain applications for, and reviews of, such licences; to enable the Environmental Protection Agency to carry out reviews of parts of licences under Part IV of the Environmental Protection Agency Act 1992 or under Part V of the Waste Management Act 1996 in certain circumstances; for those and other purposes to amend the Environmental Protection Agency Act 1992 and the Waste Management Act 1996; to provide for the making of guidance and criteria in relation to green public procurement; to make provision in relation to the reporting by certain public bodies on the integration of green public procurement criteria into procurement processes; for those and other purposes to amend the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hiarratais a dhéanamh ar cheadúnais, nó maidir le hiarratais a dhéanamh ar athbhreithnithe ar cheadúnais, faoi Chuid IV den Acht fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 nó faoi Chuid V den Acht um Bainistiú Dramhaíola, 1996 in imthosca éigeandála áirithe; do thabhairt éifeacht d’Airteagail 1(3) agus 2(4) de Threoir 2011/92/AE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 13 Nollaig 2011 maidir le measúnú a dhéanamh ar éifeachtaí tionscadal poiblí agus príobháideach áirithe ar an gcomhshaol, arna leasú le Treoir 2014/52/AE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 16 Aibreán 2014, i ndáil le hiarratais ar cheadúnais den sórt sin nó i ndáil le hiarratais ar athbhreithnithe ar cheadúnais den sórt sin; do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le tréimhsí le haghaidh cinnteoireacht maidir le hiarratais áirithe ar cheadúnais den sórt sin agus maidir le hathbhreithnithe áirithe ar cheadúnais den sórt sin; dá chumasú don Ghníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil athbhreithnithe a dhéanamh ar chodanna de cheadúnais faoi Chuid IV den Acht fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 nó faoi Chuid V den Acht um Bainistiú Dramhaíola, 1996 in imthosca áirithe; chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 agus an Achta um Bainistiú Dramhaíola, 1996; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le treoir agus critéir a cheapadh i ndáil le sainfháil phoiblí ghlas; do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le tuairisciú ag comhlachtaí poiblí áirithe maidir le critéir sainfhála poiblí glaise a chomhtháthú i bpróisis sainfhála; chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile, do leasú an Achta um an nGeilleagar Ciorclach agus Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha, 2022; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Comhshaoil (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2025

as.showAs: Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment

debates.showAs: Air Pollution (Amendment) Bill 2025: Order for Second Stage
Air Pollution (Amendment) Bill 2025: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Air Pollution Act 1987 to make new provision for the appointment and powers of authorised persons, for offences, penalties, fixed payment notices and compliance notices, for regulations relating to fuel, for the establishment of registers, appointment of registration bodies and registration on such registers, for the forfeiture of articles connected with an offence, and for the sharing of information, and for other purposes; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thruailliú Aeir, 1987 chun socrú nua a dhéanamh maidir le ceapadh agus cumhachtaí daoine údaraithe, maidir le cionta, pionóis, fógraí íocaíochta seasta agus fógraí um chomhlíonadh, maidir le rialacháin a bhaineann le breosla, maidir le cláir a bhunú, comhlachtaí clárúcháin a cheapadh agus clárú ar na cláir sin, maidir le forghéilleadh airceadal atá bainteach le cion, agus maidir le comhroinnt faisnéise, agus chun críoch eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thruailliú Aeir (Leasú), 2025

as.showAs: Minister for Climate, Energy and the Environment

debates.showAs: Wildlife (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend section 23 of the Wildlife Act, 1976 to include the Sprat Fish, Sprattus sprattus, in the Fifth Schedule of the Act; to prohibit the targeted fishing of sprat except where caught as bycatch; to provide for a moratorium on commercial sprat fishing until sufficient scientific data is available regarding sprat habitats, population dynamics, and their ecological role, to include a Just Transition for inshore fishers; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú alt 23 den Acht um Fhiadhúlra, 1976 chun go n-áireofar an Salán, sprattus sprattus, sa Chúigiú Sceideal a ghabhann leis an Acht; do thoirmeasc iascaireacht spriocdhírithe a dhéanamh ar shaláin seachas i gcás go ngabhtar saláin mar fhoghabháil; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le moratóir ar iascaireacht tráchtála a dhéanamh ar shaláin go dtí go mbeidh sonraí leordhóthanacha eolaíocha ar fáil maidir le gnáthóga an tsaláin, dinimic a lín, agus an ról éiceolaíoch atá aige, lena n-áireofar plean um Aistriú Cóir d’iascairí cladaigh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhiadhúlra (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Occupying Power (Securities and Handling of Settlement Goods) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that the Central Bank shall not approve a prospectus for securities issued by or on behalf of a state that is an occupying power; to provide for the purposes of the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015 that a dismissal of an employee shall be deemed unfair where it arises from a refusal to handle goods associated with the activities of an occupying power within occupied territory; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú nach gceadóidh an Banc Ceannais réamheolaire le haghaidh urrúis arna n-eisiúint ag stát is cumhacht forghabhála, nó thar ceann stát den sórt sin; do dhéanamh socrú, chun críocha na nAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015, go measfar dífhostú fostaí a bheith éagórach i gcás go n-eascraíonn sé as diúltú earraí atá bainteach le gníomhaíochtaí cumhachta forghabhála laistigh de chríoch faoi fhorghabháil a láimhseáil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Occupying Power (Securities and Handling of Settlement Goods) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chumhacht Forghabhála (Urrúis agus Láimhseáil Earraí Lonnaíochta), 2025

debates.showAs: Taxes Consolidation (Development of Regional Film Industry) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 to enable the Minister to identify regions of low audiovisual capacity and to include measures in the industry development test for Section 481 tax relief to promote the development of audiovisual production outside existing major production hubs.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánacha, 1997 chun a chumasú don Aire réigiúin ina bhfuil acmhainn chlosamhairc íseal a shainaithint agus bearta a áireamh sa tástáil um fhorbairt tionscail i gcomhair faoiseamh cánach faoi Alt 481 chun forbairt léiriúcháin closamhairc a chur chun cinn lasmuigh de na moil léiriúcháin mhóra atá ann cheana.
bill.shortTitleEn: Taxes Consolidation (Development of Regional Film Industry) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Comhdhlúite Cánacha (Tionscal Scannán Réigiúnach a Fhorbairt) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Compulsory Purchase Order Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the assessment of compensation payable on account of the compulsory acquisition of land; to provide for the acquisition of land by vesting order; to provide for the making of advance payments to owners, lessees and occupiers on account of compensation owed to them as a consequence of the compulsory acquisition of land; to provide for the transfer of functions relating to the assessment of compensation for compulsorily acquired land to the Valuation Tribunal; for those purposes to repeal the Acquisition of Land (Assessment of Compensation) Act 1919; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le measúnacht a dhéanamh ar an gcúiteamh is iníoctha ar cuntas fáil éigeantach talún; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le talamh a fháil le hordú dílseacháin; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le réamhíocaíochtaí a dhéanamh le húinéirí, léasaithe agus áititheoirí ar cuntas cúiteamh atá dlite dóibh de dhroim fáil éigeantach talún; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le feidhmeanna a bhaineann le measúnacht a dhéanamh ar chúiteamh i leith talamh a fhaightear go héigeantach a aistriú chuig an mBinse Luachála; chun na gcríoch sin, d’aisghairm an Acquisition of Land (Assessment of Compensation) Act, 1919; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ordú Ceannaigh Éigeantaigh, 2025

debates.showAs: Road Traffic and Roads (Blood Bikes Exemption) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Roads Act 1993 and the Road Traffic Act 1994 to exempt blood bike operators from road tolls and from restrictions from which ambulances are granted exemptions, including access to bus lanes, in the performance of their duties, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na mBóithre, 1993 agus an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1994 chun oibritheoirí rothar fola a dhíolmhú ó dholaí ar bhóithre agus ó shrianta óna ndeonaítear díolúintí d’otharchairr, lena n-áirítear rochtain ar lánaí bus, le linn dóibh a ndualgais a chomhlíonadh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Road Traffic and Roads (Blood Bikes Exemption) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre agus um Bóithre (Díolúine do Rothair Fola) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Health (Amendment) Bill 2025: Second Stage
Health (Amendment) Bill 2025: Referral to Select Committee

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Act 2004 to provide for revised corporate governance and accountability arrangements of the Health Service Executive; to provide for the conferral of certain functions with regard to those revised arrangements on the Minister for Children, Disability and Equality; to provide for consultation in certain matters between, and joint functions of, the Minister for Health and the Minister for Children, Disability and Equality with regard to those revised arrangements; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 2024 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le socruithe athleasaithe de chuid Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte i ndáil le rialachas corparáideach agus cuntasacht; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le feidhmeanna áirithe i ndáil leis na socruithe athleasaithe sin a thabhairt don Aire Leanaí, Míchumais agus Comhionannais; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhchomhairle faoi nithe áirithe idir an tAire Sláinte agus an tAire Leanaí, Míchumais agus Comhionannais, agus maidir le comhfheidhmeanna de chuid na nAirí sin, i ndáil leis na socruithe athleasaithe sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Leasú), 2025

as.showAs: Minister for Health

debates.showAs: Coroners (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Act of 1962, to provide for a verdict of Iatrogenic Suicide and related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht 1962, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíorasc arb éard é Féinmharú Iatraigineach agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Cróinéirí (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Proceeds of Crime and Related Matters Bill 2025: Committee Stage
Proceeds of Crime and Related Matters Bill 2025: Second Stage
Proceeds of Crime and Related Matters Bill 2025: Referral to Select Committee

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the continued detention of property for the purposes of an investigation by the Criminal Assets Bureau in certain circumstances; to provide for the giving of payment freezing directions by a bureau officer, and the making of payment freezing orders by the District Court, in respect of funds in accounts in certain circumstances; to reduce the period of time an interlocutory order is required to be in place before a disposal order can be made in respect of certain property; to provide for the appointment of a receiver to deprive a person of the ongoing benefit and use of property in certain circumstances and for those and other purposes to amend the Proceeds of Crime Act 1996; to amend the Criminal Justice Act 1994; to amend the Criminal Assets Bureau Act 1996; to amend the Criminal Justice (Corruption Offences) Act 2018; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go leanfar de mhaoin a choinneáil chun críoch imscrúdaithe ag an mBiúró um Shócmhainní Coiriúla in imthosca áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hoifigeach biúró do thabhairt treoruithe calctha íocaíochtaí, agus maidir leis an gCúirt Dúiche do dhéanamh orduithe calctha íocaíochtaí, i leith cistí i gcuntais in imthosca áirithe; do laghdú na tréimhse ama arb ar a feadh is gá d’ordú idirbhreitheach a bheith i bhfeidhm sular féidir ordú diúscartha a dhéanamh i leith maoin áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le glacadóir a cheapadh chun an cumas tairbhe agus úsáid leanúnach a bhaint as maoin a bhaint de dhuine in imthosca áirithe agus chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile do leasú an Achta um Fháltais ó Choireacht, 1996; do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil, 1994; do leasú an Achta fán mBiúró um Shócmhainní Coiriúla, 1996; do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Cionta Éillithe), 2018; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Proceeds of Crime and Related Matters Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fháltais ó Choireacht agus Nithe Gaolmhara, 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision in relation to the availability of general practitioner medical and surgical services throughout the State, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le hinfhaighteacht seirbhísí liachta agus máinliachta lia-chleachtóirí ginearálta ar fud an Stáit, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Availability of General Practitioner Services) Bill 2025

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Leave for Health Screening Purposes) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave in order to enable employees to participate in health screening programmes; for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997; to extend the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015; to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other Acts; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá d’fhonn a chumasú d’fhostaithe páirt a ghlacadh i gcláir braitheoireachta sláinte; chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997; do leathnú na cosanta ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar Achtanna áirithe eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Leave for Health Screening Purposes) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Saoire chun críoch Braitheoireachta Sláinte), 2025

debates.showAs: Animal Health and Welfare (Welfare of Pigs) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to improve the welfare of pigs by prohibiting teeth-clipping, tail-docking and castration, limiting the use of tusk reduction and regulating sow stalls and farrowing crates.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun leas muc a fheabhsú trí thoirmeasc a chur le bearradh fiacla, sciotadh eireaball agus coilleadh, tríd an úsáid a bhaintear as laghdú starrfhiacla a theorannú agus trí stallaí cránacha agus cliathbhoscaí cráinbhreithe a rialáil.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Health and Welfare (Welfare of Pigs) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe (Leas Muc), 2025

debates.showAs: Disregard of Historic Offences for Consensual Sexual Activity Between Men Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for a process for the disregard of certain historic criminal convictions arising from consensual sexual activity between men; to amend the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission Act 2014; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le próiseas chun neamhaird a thabhairt ar chiontuithe coiriúla stairiúla áirithe a d’eascair as gníomhaíocht ghnéasach chomhthoiliúil idir fir; do leasú an Achta fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas, 2014; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Neamhaird a Thabhairt ar Chionta Stairiúla i dtaobh Gníomhaíocht Ghnéasach Chomhthoiliúil Idir Fir, 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009 to recognise the duty of national public service broadcasters and Coimisiún na Meán to proactively make efforts to ensure equal access to national public broadcasting services across the whole community of the island of Ireland.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009 chun aitheantas a thabhairt don dualgas atá ar chraoltóirí seirbhíse poiblí náisiúnta agus ar Choimisiún na Meán iarrachtaí a dhéanamh go réamhghníomhach chun rochtain chomhionann ar sheirbhísí craolacháin phoiblí náisiúnta a chinntiú ar fud phobal uile oileán na hÉireann.

act.longTitleEn: Act to extend the period for which an area is prescribed as a rent pressure zone; to provide that areas in the State not prescribed as rent pressure zones are deemed to be so prescribed; to extend the relevant period for the purpose of rent reviews under section 20 of the Residential Tenancies Act 2004; for those purposes, to amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht d’fhadú na tréimhse a mbeidh limistéar forordaithe mar chrios brú cíosa ar a feadh; do dhéanamh socrú, maidir le limistéir sa Stát nach bhfuil forordaithe mar chriosanna brú cíosa, go measfar iad a bheith forordaithe amhlaidh; d’fhadú na tréimhse iomchuí chun críche athbhreithnithe cíosa faoi alt 20 den Acht um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004; chun na gcríoch sin, do leasú an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 agus an Achta um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Leasú), 2019; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Copyright and Related Rights Act 2000 to make further provision for the sharing of equitable remuneration as between performers and owners of the copyright in sound recordings; to give further effect to Directive 2006/115/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 12 December 2006 on rental right and lending right and on certain rights related to copyright in the field of intellectual property; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Cóipchirt agus Ceart Gaolmhar, 2000 chun socrú breise a dhéanamh maidir le luach saothair cothromasach a chomhroinnt amhail idir taibheoirí agus úinéirí an chóipchirt i dtaifeadtaí fuaime; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2006/115/CE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 12 Nollaig 2006 maidir leis an gceart cíosa agus leis an gceart iasachta agus maidir le cearta áirithe a bhaineann le cóipcheart i réimse na maoine intleachtúla; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Taxes Consolidation (Rights of Performers and Film Workers) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 to ensure the certificate required for Section 481 tax relief is only issued to qualifying companies which afford equal terms to Irish performers, comply with copyright legislation, and do not engage in the practice of so-called ‘buy-out’ contracts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánacha, 1997 chun a chinntiú nach ndéanfar an deimhniú is gá le haghaidh faoiseamh cánach faoi Alt 481 a eisiúint ach amháin chuig cuideachtaí cáilitheacha a thugann téarmaí comhionanna do thaibheoirí Éireannacha, a chomhlíonann reachtaíocht chóipchirt, agus nach ngabhann don chleachtas ar a dtugtar conarthaí ‘imcheannaigh’.
bill.shortTitleEn: Taxes Consolidation (Rights of Performers and Film Workers) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Comhdhlúite Cánacha (Cearta Taibheoirí agus Oibrithe Scannán) (Leasú), 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 to ban the hunting of a fox or foxes; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe, 2013 chun cosc a chur ar shionnach nó ar shionnaigh a fhiach; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Animal Health and Welfare (Ban on Fox Hunting) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte agus Leas Ainmhithe (Cosc ar Shionnaigh a Fhiach), 2025

Wind Turbine Regulation Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate wind turbines to provide limits on the exportation of product generated from wind turbines, to protect nearby dwellings from noise and shadow flicker by providing minimum set back distances, to allow access to public consultative processes; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil tuirbíní gaoithe d’fhonn teorainneacha le honnmhairiú táirge arna ghiniúint ó thuirbíní gaoithe a shocrú, do chosaint teaghaisí in aice láimhe ar thorann agus ar chaochaíl scáileanna trí shlánachair íosta a shocrú, dá cheadú rochtain a fháil ar phróisis chomhchomhairleacha phoiblí; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rialáil Tuirbíní Gaoithe, 2025

debates.showAs: Protection of Employees (Employers’ Insolvency) (Amendment) Bill 2025: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Protection of Employees (Employers’ Insolvency) Act 1984; to give further effect to Directive 2008/94/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 October 2008 on the protection of employees in the event of the insolvency of their employer; to make provision for the deeming of employers to be insolvent in certain circumstances; to make further provision on the treatment of employees whose employer enters into an insolvency arrangement; to make further provision for the manner of calculation of certain payments made out of the Social Insurance Fund to certain employees in respect of insolvent employers; to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chosaint Fostaithe (Dócmhainneacht Fostóirí), 1984; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2008/94/CE ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle an 22 Deireadh Fómhair 2008 maidir le fostaithe a chosaint i gcás dhócmhainneacht a bhfostóra; do dhéanamh socrú chun go measfar fostóirí a bheith dócmhainneach in imthosca áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú breise maidir leis an gcaoi a ndéileálfar le fostaithe a ndéanfaidh a bhfostóir comhshocraíocht dócmhainneachta; do dhéanamh socrú breise maidir leis an modh ar a ríomhfar íocaíochtaí áirithe arna ndéanamh as an gCiste Árachais Shóisialaigh le fostaithe áirithe i leith fostóirí dócmhainneacha; do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Fostaithe (Dócmhainneacht Fostóirí) (Leasú), 2025

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to empower the Minister for Finance to make regulations imposing certain restrictive measures in respect of securities issued by or on behalf of the State of Israel; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chumhachtú don Aire Airgeadais rialacháin a dhéanamh lena bhforchuirfear bearta sriantacha áirithe i leith urrúis arna n-eisiúint ag Stát Iosrael nó thar a cheann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Restrictive Financial Measures (State of Israel) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bearta Sriantacha Airgeadais (Stát Iosrael), 2025
